Text.Page:
One of my patrols hasn't reported back, and with all the dangers of the desert, who knows what's keeping them? Too many ways to die out there.

Their route took them north. Head out and see if you can find any sign of them.
(This corpse is badly mutilated, as if mauled by a wild beast.)
(A deep stab wound splits this corpse's chest. It looks like the mark of an orcan blade.)
(This corpse looks untouched, but all of the waterskins nearby are empty.)

I hoped there'd be a few survivors at least. Damn!

Thank you for recovering their medals. We must never forget our fallen comrades.

I have one other soldier out there alone right now. Can you lend him a hand?

Find Qasimir near the entrance of Sand Wind Village...if he's still there.

Dead? All of them? Blast. Stadrian must feel awful about their loss.

That patrol was supposed to stop here and help against the kulkaris.

Feel up to the challenge?
